directions: In a large pot, melt butter and cook onion until tender over medium high heat. Add potato and toss to coat with butter. Add hot stock and bring to a simmer. Stir in broccoli and return to a simmer. When potato and broccoli are tender, puree in batches in a blender or food processor. Return to pot and add cream. Season to taste and serve warm
ingredients: 1/2 cup cream, heavy, light or half-n-half
3 cups chopped broccoli florets and stems
title: Simple Cream of Broccoli Soup
